high_descs: Turn around and head straight, then proceed to turn left towards the bed.
Pick up cloth from the bed .
Turn right and head straight, then hang left towards the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a  cloth by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn left and go straight, turn left towards the bed
Pick up cloth from the bed
Turn right and go straight towards the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a cloth by the light of a desk lamp

high_descs: Turn around and turn left towards the bed
pick the cloth from the bed
Turn right and move to the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: switch on the desk lamp and check the cloth in the light
